sluce2.carve.biomebgc
Class BiomeBGCCase

java.lang.Object
  sluce2.carve.biomebgc.BiomeBGCCase

public class BiomeBGCCase
extends java.lang.Object

BiomeBGCCase denotes a single set of BiomeBGC settings that can be used by pointbgc to run. It has the path to all external files and important features related to land management. Use this class to create a specific case from existing ones.

Author:
Shipeng Sun

Field Detail

bgcInitHandler

protected BiomeBGCInitFileHandler bgcInitHandler
The BiomeBGC initial file handler, through which all other information can be retrieved.

propertyFile

protected java.lang.String propertyFile
This is a standard Java properties file. It save some critical information about pointpgc.

A sample file supported by Java Properties.

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <!DOCTYPE properties SYSTEM "http://java.sun.com/dtd/properties.dtd"> <properties> <comment>== BiomeBGC Properties for SLUCE2 ==</comment> <entry key="bgcDirectory">C:/Users/sunsp/workspace/biomebgc-4.2/biomebgc-4.2/</entry> <entry key="bgcExecFile">C:/Users/sunsp/workspace/biomebgc-4.2/biomebgc-4.2/pointbgc.exe</entry> <entry key="iniFileTemplate">ini/oth_2.ini</entry> <entry key="restartInputFileLineNum">11</entry> <entry key="restartOutputFileLineNum">12</entry> <entry key="meteroFileLineNum">50</entry> <entry key="epcFileLineNum">61</entry> </properties>
